title: Was December 25th not celebrated as the birthdate of Jesus Christ until the year 240 AD, 300 AD, 400 AD, or 440 AD? - Quora

response.answer_text: As mentioned, the first record of a Christmas celebration was from AD 354. However, as a general rule, if a religious celebration is important enough to be recorded, it almost certainly has a history prior to that. Was December 25th not celebrated as the birthdate of Jesus Christ until the year 240 AD, 300 AD, 400 AD, or 440 AD?
